Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Finding by Site or System/Reproductive System Finding/Decreased Sperm Count/Oligospermia,/NCIThesaurus/Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Finding/Finding by Site or System/Reproductive System Finding/Sexual Dysfunction and Infertility/Oligospermia
Male Urogenital Diseases/Genital Diseases, Male/Infertility/Infertility, Male/Oligospermia
Record.Description: A condition of suboptimal concentration of SPERMATOZOA in the ejaculated SEMEN to ensure successful FERTILIZATION of an OVUM. In humans, oligospermia is defined as a sperm count below 20 million per milliliter semen.
